mapper.sql: id, username, password, icon, email, nick_name, note, create_time, login_time, status
mapper.select: select ua.id, username, password, icon, email, nick_name, note, ua.create_time, login_time, ua.status , ur.id ur_id, NAME, description, admin_count, ur.create_time ur_time, ur.status ur_status, sort from ums_admin ua inner join ums_admin_role_relation uar inner join ums_role ur on uar.admin_id = ua.id and uar.role_id = ur.id where ua.username = #{username}
